temples.history: The Washington D.C. Temple was announced on November 15th, 1968 and the groundbreaking began on December 7th, 1968. It was dedicated on November 19th, 1974, but, due to renovations, will be rededicated on August 14th, 2022.
temples.address: 9900 Stoneybrook Dr, Kensington, MD 20895, United States

temples.history: The Manhattan New York Temple was announced on August 7th, 2002 and the groundbreaking began on September 23rd, 2002. It was dedicated on June 13th, 2004.
temples.address: 125 Columbus Ave Fourth Floor, New York, NY 10023, United States

temples.history: The Philadelphia Pennsylvania Temple was announced on October 4th, 2008 and the groundbreaking began on September 17th, 2011. It was dedicated on September 18th, 2016.
temples.address: 1739 Vine St, Philadelphia, PA 19103, United States

temples.history: The Richmond Virginia Temple was announced on April 1st, 2018 and the groundbreaking began on April 11th, 2020. This temple is still under construction..
temples.address: 10915 Staples Mill Rd, Glen Allen, VA 23060
